name: Nostradamus
0:
”Alexa ask Nostradamus Predictions when will California become an island.”
”Alexa ask Nostradamus Predictions to tell me the price of gold next year.”
”Alexa ask Nostradamus Predictions who will win the superbowl.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nostradamus predictions
des:
Disclaimer: this skill is for entertainment purposes only and does not provide actual predictions of the future.

Just like the great Nostradamus, this skill will make a prediction for when something will occur. Ask, "Alexa, ask Nostradamus Predictions when I will be a millionaire", or "Alexa ask Nostradamus Predictions when will California become an island.". His predictions can be scarily accurate. He's especially good with the weather; simply ask him "to predict the weather".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
